movies.title: Inception
movies.overview: A skilled thief leads a team into people's dreams to steal secrets from the subconscious.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.overview: Batman faces his greatest challenge as the Joker wreaks havoc on Gotham City.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.overview: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.overview: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.overview: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.overview: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.overview: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.overview: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

movies.title: Joker
movies.overview: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime.

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.overview: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.overview: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

movies.title: Black Panther
movies.overview: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.overview: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family by infiltrating their household and posing as unrelated, highly qualified individuals.

movies.title: Dune
movies.overview: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe.

movies.title: Top Gun: Maverick
movies.overview: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates on a mission.

movies.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
movies.overview: An aging Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure, where she alone can save what's important to her by connecting with the lives she could have led.
